about: I'm a Full Stack Developer specializing in Next.js, TypeScript, and modern web technologies. I create responsive, high-performance web applications with clean, maintainable code. With a strong foundation in both frontend and backend development, I enjoy tackling complex problems and delivering elegant solutions.

projects.title: E-commerce Platform
projects.description: A full-featured e-commerce platform with product catalog, cart, checkout, and user authentication. Includes admin dashboard for inventory management.

projects.title: Task Management App
projects.description: A Kanban-style task management application with drag-and-drop functionality, task assignment, deadlines, and progress tracking.

projects.title: Weather Dashboard
projects.description: Real-time weather application with 7-day forecast, location search, and interactive maps. Uses OpenWeatherMap API for data.

experience.description: Lead developer for the company's client-facing web applications. Implemented modern React patterns and optimized performance across the platform.
Developed and maintained multiple web applications using React, Node.js, and MongoDB. Improved application performance by 40%.
Collaborated on frontend development tasks and contributed to various client projects. Gained experience with React and modern JavaScript.
